articles.description:
Funny how LayerZero relayer gas fees drop immediately post TGE.
For years they were charging multiples of break-even cost via this hidden fee.
Farmers got farmed 🤝
https://x.com/YouAreMyYield/status/1803710143474827323

USD Denominated: One underappreciated fact about the $ZRO saga is that after the ZRO snapshot Stargate lowered its fees and they are now dirt cheap

Half of that - so $50m - goes to $BLUR stakers and the other half to NFT market makers.

There's Blast Points and there's Blast Gold.

There's 2 way to earn Points:
1) bridge & hold assets in your wallet
2) deposit them into an app
